articles.title: Iranian killed 'celebrating' World Cup loss to US - DAWN.com
articles.description: Iranian man shot dead by security forces after celebrating US win, says rights group.
articles.content:
PARIS: An Iranian man was shot dead by the security forces after celebrating when the United States eliminated his countrys national team from the World Cup, rights groups said on Wednesday.
